description: This file defines a class OpenCVTools that provides methods for capturing images and videos from a webcam using OpenCV. It includes functionality for initializing the webcam, capturing frames, encoding images, and saving videos as base64-encoded artifacts, with support for different platforms and codecs.

classes.name: OpenCVTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for capturing images and videos from a webcam using OpenCV, inheriting from Toolkit.

methods.name: capture_image
methods.description: Captures an image from the webcam, encodes it as PNG, and attaches it as an ImageArtifact to the agent.

methods.name: capture_video
methods.description: Records a video from the webcam for a specified duration, encodes it as base64, and attaches it as a VideoArtifact to the agent.
